name: Ralph GRIFFITH, Appellant v. John SNADER and Kennett Township and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Appellees

parties: Ralph GRIFFITH, Appellant v. John SNADER and Kennett Township and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2003, we DISMISS the appeal as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
819 A.2d 534
Ralph GRIFFITH, Appellant v. John SNADER and Kennett Township and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 24, 2003.
